name: Dire Circumstances
description:
Did you and your friends enjoy the book you found today... with its pages upon pages of mysterious symbols? That book is mine, and you have stolen it. Do not worry, I left a, let us call it, a gift inside.  

  

You truly believed nothing would happen if you traced its devilish markings tonight? It is Halloween, you know?  

  

Once you finished with the last symbol, you unleashed my son, a ravenous beast of a boy. Yes, he may have slaughtered all of your friends, but you, you are a clever one, taking to cover under your bed like a child. The blood of your friends seeping between the floorboards, staining your small pathetic hands.  

  

It would seem that you still have the book even. Be a good kid and send him back to me, will you? I'll forgive all that has happened then. All you must do is retrace the symbols of my book. If you can survive that long.  

  

Have fun dear, and be quick about it.

TUTORIAL 

Hold the Left Mouse Button down on the shape on the right page of the book to trace the symbol in blood. 

You must return back to your starting point on the shape for it to be complete. 

Press Space to lower the book and catch your breath. The monster will stop looking for you when you're not drawing.

Press Escape to open the Pause Menu.
